page.title: 12LANDSCAPE -PHOTOGRAPH B
page.content: On the horizon the flattened slag heap of Kingshill Colliery (East of the area)Middle right background farmland mainly pasture(dairy).Centre left woods of Murdostoun Estate (boundary of area). Across centre small rises in land ,grass covered reclaimed slag heaps. Centre right storage yard of Costain Concrete Company .Bottom left Manse road Newmains leading to Newmains Cross shops along the north side .Across from shops grassy area former site of miners rows.Bottom right Newmains Primary School built at the beginning of this century.
